title: Remco Evenepoel in the dark as merger chaos reigns at Quick-Step: ‘We get zero information’
content:
Even team talisman Evenepoel waits on news of peloton-shaking merger with Jumbo-Visma as teammates cling to hope of 'refugee' team.

Read the full article at Remco Evenepoel in the dark as merger chaos reigns at Quick-Step: ‘We get zero information’ on Velo.
author: Jim Cotton
